駛.definition: (of a vehicle, horse etc) to go fast; to speed; (of a vehicle) to run; to go; (of a boat) to sail

駛入.definition: (of a car, ship, train etc) to enter

駛出.definition: to leave port; to put off

駛向.definition: (of a train, boat, plane etc) to head in the direction of

駛往.definition: (of a vehicle, boat etc) to travel to; to head for

駛離.definition: to steer (the plane) away from; to drive away (from a place); to leave
